name: CCLog
summary: CCLog : Simple and lightweight cross-platform logs, support for multiple languages, such as C, C++, Perl 6, shell, Objective-C.
description:
CCLog Simple and lightweight cross-platform logs,
easy-to-use simple learning,
and support for multiple languages,
such as C, C++, Perl 6, shell, Objective-C
support ios, osx, watchos, tvos, pod
